DAO_connection

Interface CompanyDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompanyDBDA

    public interface CompanyDAO
    Version:
    1.0v
    Company interface contains all method that should use to interact with company information and Database queries to store or remove or update or get information from system
    Author:
    MatrixComp - ibrahim shweiki

    • Method Summary

      get Company Id by checking company where the company name is unique cannot store two company with the same name and return back company id

      Login : required user name and password and the method will check them via database if exist or not and return true or false
